system.prerequisites:
Precision Telekinesis, Telekinetic Wep
OW: Psy Rating 6
system.sustained: Creates a number of Force Shards equal to the Psyker's Psy Rating that hover around the Psyker and act as a barrier to harm. Opponents attacking the Psyker while they have one or more Force Shards orbiting them have -10 to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill Tests. The Psyker can choose to launch one or more Force Shards on subsequent turns at a single target or anyone within 2 metres of that target as a ranged attack. The Psyker makes a +0 Willpower Test to hit the target, success hits with one shard, +1 per Degree of Success up to the number of shards the Psyker has. Each Shard does 1d10+2xPsy Rating Rending Damage, with Psy Rating Penetration. This attack can be dodged as with other ranged attacks.
